ygData.subject: Blast from the past
ygData.msgSnippet: The beauty of space, so vast so wonderful. So silent, but if you could hear, you would hear the ripping of rocket fuel through the void. Inside a starcruiser.

Subject: Blast from the past
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The beauty of space, so vast so wonderful. So silent, but if you could
hear, you would hear the ripping of rocket fuel through the void.
Inside a starcruiser. Six Figuers crowd around a moniter. In a low raspy
voice one talks. "There's our destination.Well" Another more agitated voice
speaks "Well what, all these years in stasis has made my joints rusty, when
do we get to bust heads, hah ha haaa" he finishes. "cool it" blurts another
"we have our oubjective, I mean our ibjective, I mean, we uh have our
orders". "Yeah" responds the agitative one "create chaos, I cant wait". On
the monitor earth slowly aproaches the viewer getting larger.
